gaia::core::IControllerTransitionListener Class Reference

Detailed Description

This interface is used for listening to starting and ending events for transitions.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::core::IControllerTransitionListener::endTransition ( IControllerTransitionListener *  transition,
WidgetController *  container,
Widget *  view,
int32_t  transitionType 
) [pure virtual]

This event is sent to listeners when any type of transition animation ends.

Parameters:
transitionThe LayoutTransition sending out the event.
containerThe ViewGroup on which the transition is playing.
viewThe View object being affected by the transition animation.
transitionTypeThe type of transition that is ending,
See also:
ControllerTransition::APPEARING,
ControllerTransition::DISAPPEARING,
ControllerTransition::CHANGE_APPEARING, or
ControllerTransition::CHANGE_DISAPPEARING.

WidgetController *  container,
Widget *  view,
int32_t  transitionType 
) [pure virtual]

This event is sent to listeners when any type of transition animation begins.

Parameters:
transitionThe LayoutTransition sending out the event.
containerThe ViewGroup on which the transition is playing.
viewThe View object being affected by the transition animation.
transitionTypeThe type of transition that is beginning,
See also:
ControllerTransition::APPEARING,
ControllerTransition::DISAPPEARING,
